Allergy medicines by adverse events

Format

A data frame with 3 observations on the following 4 variables.

C1.T
a factor with levels Drowsiness Headache Insomnia
Seldane
a numeric vector
Pseudoep
a numeric vector
Placebo
a numeric vector
======= A data frame with 406 observations on two variables.
event
a factor with levels insomnia, headache, and drowsiness
medication
a factor with levels seldane-d, pseudoephedrine, and placebo
